alert.note: Alert for Belknap; Grafton (New Hampshire) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued December 18 at 10:43PM EST until December 19 at 6:00PM EST by NWS Gray/Portland
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in New Hampshire... Pemigewasset River At Plymouth affecting Belknap and Grafton Counties. Pemigewasset River At Woodstock affecting Grafton County. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL TOMORROW EVENING... * WHAT...Moderate flooding is occurring and moderate flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Pemigewasset River at Plymouth. * WHEN...Until tomorrow evening. * IMPACTS...At 20.1 feet, Flood waters rise to the doors of the PSU physical education center and the PSU ice arena. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:46 PM EST Monday the stage was 19.2 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 9:46 PM EST Monday was 19.2 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to 19.7 feet late tonight and fall below flood stage late tomorrow morning and continue falling to 3.5 feet Thursday evening. - Flood stage is 13.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the dangers of flooding. Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/gray.
